name: .AWT
summary: Learn about .AWT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open AWT files with AbiSource AbiWord (multiplatform). To open an AWT file, select File → Open... or select File → New using Template.

You can also open an AWT file with XML, source code, and plain text editors since the AWT format is based on the XML standard. However, opening an AWT file with one of these programs will not display the document like AbiWord. Therefore, you may only want to open an AWT file with an XML, source code, or plain text editor if you cannot access AbiWord and need to recover the text from the document.
AbiWord can convert AWT files to various file types, including the following formats:
